reviewText: I gave this three stars because I couldn't watch it. It was a Region 2 DVD and unusable on my player.
note that in order for one to have we must give;  in order to have we cannot focus on what is troubling us; very good foundation to entice research of one self.

Like The Secret, this movie is a great call to action in that it encourages the viewer to evolve by becoming the person we were meant to be. It contains interviews by many of the best inspirational speakers around today, and you cannot help feeling inspired and encouraged after seeing this movie. It will make you want to go after your dreams.
